rules.name: default

children.name: Offload origin
CSS and JavaScript
children.comments: Override the default caching behavior for CSS and JavaScript

children.name: Fonts
children.comments: Override the default caching behavior for fonts.

children.name: Images
children.comments: Override the default caching behavior for images.

children.name: Files
children.comments: Override the default caching behavior for files. Files containing Personal Identified Information (PII) should require Edge authentication or not be cached at all.

children.name: Other static objects
children.comments: Override the default caching behavior for other static objects.

children.name: HTML pages
children.comments: Override the default caching behavior for HTML pages cached on edge servers.

children.name: Redirects
children.comments: Configure caching for HTTP redirects. The redirect is cached for the same TTL as a 200 HTTP response when this feature is enabled.

children.name: POST responses
children.comments: Define when HTTP POST requests should be cached. You should enable it under a criteria match.

children.name: GraphQL
children.comments: Define when your GraphQL queries should be cached.

children.name: Uncacheable objects
children.comments: Configure the default client caching behavior for uncacheable content at the edge.

Control the settings related to caching content at the edge and in the browser. As a result, fewer requests go to your origin, fewer bytes leave your data centers, and your assets are closer to your users.

children.name: Minimize payload
Compressible objects
children.comments: Serve gzip compressed content for text-based formats.
Control the settings that reduce the size of the delivered content and decrease the number of bytes sent by your properties. This allows you to cut down the network overhead of your website or API.

rules.comments: The Default Rule template contains all the necessary and recommended behaviors. Rules are evaluated from top to bottom and the last matching rule wins.
rules.advancedOverride:
<!-- advanced tags -->
             <!-- Generates UID as per version 4 standard -->
                        <!-- Version 4 UUIDs have the form xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx where x is any hexadecimal digit and y is one of 8, 9, a, or b -->
                            <assign:variable>
                                <name>UID_PART_1</name>
                                <hidden>on</hidden>
                                <transform>
                                    <hexrand>
                                        <bytes>4</bytes>
                                    </hexrand>
                                </transform>
                            </assign:variable>
                            <assign:variable>
                                <name>UID_PART_2</name>
                                <hidden>on</hidden>
                                <transform>
                                    <hexrand>
                                        <bytes>2</bytes>
                                    </hexrand>
                                </transform>
                            </assign:variable>
                            <assign:variable>
                                <name>UID_PART_3</name>
                               <hidden>on</hidden>
                                <transform>
                                    <hexrand>
                                        <bytes>2</bytes>
                                    </hexrand>
                                    <substring>
                                        <start>1</start>
                                        <end>-1</end>
                                    </substring>
                                </transform>
                            </assign:variable>
                            <assign:variable>
                                <name>UID_PART_4</name>
                               <hidden>on</hidden>
                                <transform>
                                    <hexrand>
                                        <bytes>2</bytes>
                                    </hexrand>
                                    <substring>
                                        <start>1</start>
                                        <end>-1</end>
                                    </substring>
                                </transform>
                            </assign:variable>
                            <assign:variable>
                                <name>UID_PART_5</name>
                                <hidden>on</hidden>
                                <transform>
                                    <hexrand>
                                        <bytes>6</bytes>
                                    </hexrand>
                                </transform>
                            </assign:variable>
                            <!-- UID_RAND_89ab is used to select the y character of UID which can be 8,9,a or b-->
                            <assign:variable>
                                <name>UID_RAND_89ab</name>
                                <hidden>on</hidden>
                                <transform>
                                    <rand>
                                        <min>0</min>
                                        <max>3</max>
                                    </rand>
                                </transform>
                            </assign:variable>
                            <match:variable name="UID_RAND_89ab" value="0">
                                <assign:variable>
                                    <name>UID_SELECTED_CHAR</name>
                                    <value>8</value>
                                    <hidden>on</hidden>
                                </assign:variable>
                            </match:variable>
                            <match:variable name="UID_RAND_89ab" value="1">
                                <assign:variable>
                                    <name>UID_SELECTED_CHAR</name>
                                    <value>9</value>
                                    <hidden>on</hidden>
                                </assign:variable>
                            </match:variable>
                            <match:variable name="UID_RAND_89ab" value="2">
                                <assign:variable>
                                    <name>UID_SELECTED_CHAR</name>
                                    <value>a</value>
                                    <hidden>on</hidden>
                                </assign:variable>
                            </match:variable>
                            <match:variable name="UID_RAND_89ab" value="3">
                                <assign:variable>
                                    <name>UID_SELECTED_CHAR</name>
                                    <value>b</value>
                                    <hidden>on</hidden>
                                </assign:variable>
                            </match:variable>
                            <!--Assemble all the UID parts to form the final UID value -->
                            <assign:variable>
                                <name>PMUSER_UUID_FINAL</name>
                                <value>%(UID_PART_1)-%(UID_PART_2)-4%(UID_PART_3)-%(UID_SELECTED_CHAR)%(UID_PART_4)-%(UID_PART_5)</value>
                        </assign:variable>
<!-- Add UUID Header to outgoing request to Origin -->
<edgeservices:modify-outgoing-request.add-header>
    <status>on</status>
    <name>X-UUID</name>
    <value>%(PMUSER_UUID_FINAL)</value>
  </edgeservices:modify-outgoing-request.add-header>

        <comment:note value="turn on request body inspection"/>
        <edgeservices:inspect-request-body.status>on</edgeservices:inspect-request-body.status>
        <edgeservices:inspect-request-body.limit>128KB</edgeservices:inspect-request-body.limit>
        <edgeservices:inspect-request-body.free-body-early>off</edgeservices:inspect-request-body.free-body-early>
        <comment:note value="End Feature advanced"/>
        <comment:note value="Start API Extraction ONLY for POST body requests and NOT for api-keys in a header"/>
        <match:request.header name="%(PMUSER_KEY_HEADER)" result="false">
           <match:variable name="AK_QUERY" result="false">
            <match:request.method result="true" value="POST">
                <match:metadata-stage value="client-request-body">
                    <match:regex flags="s" impl="re2" regex="(.*)" select="XML_PAIRS://apikey" strict-err-check-re2="on">
                        <assign:variable>
                            <name>PMUSER_API_KEY_VALUE</name>
                            <value>%(AK_SELECT)</value>
                        </assign:variable>
                    </match:regex>
                    <comment:note value="End API Extraction"/>
                    <!-- enable IPA processing to a different trees -->
                    <match:request.header name="X-Akamai-Processing-Agent" result="false">
                        <match:variable name="AK_QUERY" result="false">
                            <edgeservices:processing-agent>
                                <status>on</status>
                                <log-r-line>on</log-r-line>
                                <url>%(AK_URL)?api_key=%(PMUSER_API_KEY_VALUE)</url>
                                <host>failover.dj.config.rapid.com.co</host>
                                <authenticate>off</authenticate>
                                <post-body/>
                            </edgeservices:processing-agent>
                        </match:variable>
                        <match:variable name="AK_QUERY">
                            <edgeservices:processing-agent>
                                <status>on</status>
                                <log-r-line>on</log-r-line>
                                <url>%(AK_URL)&api_key=%(PMUSER_API_KEY_VALUE)</url>
                                <host>failover.dj.config.rapid.com.co</host>
                                <authenticate>off</authenticate>
                                <post-body/>
                            </edgeservices:processing-agent>
                        </match:variable>
                    </match:request.header>
                </match:metadata-stage>
            </match:request.method>
          </match:variable>
        </match:request.header>

<!-- Add APIkey Header to outgoing request to Origin -->
<match:metadata-stage value="client-request">
<edgeservices:modify-outgoing-request.add-header>
    <status>on</status>
    <name>apikey</name>
    <value>%(PMUSER_API_KEY_VALUE)</value>
  </edgeservices:modify-outgoing-request.add-header>
</match:metadata-stage>



        <!-- Check what response we got from content server for IPA authorization request and set variables for later processing -->
        <match:processing-agent-response host="failover.dj.config.rapid.com.co">
            <match:response.status result="true" value="401">
                <assign:variable>
                    <name>DENY</name>
                    <value>true</value>
                </assign:variable>
                <assign:variable>
                    <name>STS_CD</name>
                    <value>401</value>
                </assign:variable>
            </match:response.status>
            <match:response.status result="true" value="403">
                <assign:variable>
                    <name>DENY</name>
                    <value>true</value>
                </assign:variable>
                <assign:variable>
                    <name>STS_CD</name>
                    <value>403</value>
                </assign:variable>
            </match:response.status>
        </match:processing-agent-response>
        <!-- Deny the client request for content if we got 401 response from origin for IPA authorization request -->
        <match:metadata-stage value="ipa-response">
            <match:variable name="DENY" value="true">
                <assign:extract-value>
                    <variable-name>GWERR_FROM_IPA</variable-name>
                    <location>IPA_Response_Header</location>
                    <location-id>dummy-header</location-id>
                </assign:extract-value>
            </match:variable>
            <!-- Deny the request if API-GW/IPA is a auth deny -->
            <match:variable name="DENY" value="true">
                <auth:acl.deny>API-GW-Fail</auth:acl.deny>
            </match:variable>
            <!-- add IPA response body  -->
            <match:response.status result="true" value="401">
                <edgeservices:construct-abort-response>
                    <status>on</status>
                    <http-status>401</http-status>
                    <body>%(GWERR_FROM_IPA)</body>
                </edgeservices:construct-abort-response>
            </match:response.status>
            <match:response.status result="true" value="403">
                <edgeservices:construct-abort-response>
                    <status>on</status>
                    <http-status>403</http-status>
                    <body>%(GWERR_FROM_IPA)</body>
                </edgeservices:construct-abort-response>
            </match:response.status>
        </match:metadata-stage>
